text: Leda! Tirigi srstimpabadataniki asadhyamainadani mi hrdayalu bhavince daniga unna sare! (Tirigi lepabadataru)". Varu malli ila adugutaru: "Mam'malni tirigi bratikinci lepagala vadu evadu?" Varito anu: "Ayane, mim'malni modatisari puttincina vadu!" Varu egataliga talalu uputu antaru: "Ayite! Adi eppudu sambhavistundi?" Varito anu: "Bahusa a samayam samipanlone undavaccu
